amendment.description: To encourage the availability of MedicareAdvantage benefits in medically underserved areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1030 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1030 proposed by Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S8489-8493; text: CR S8489) To encourage the availability of MedicareAdvantage benefits in medically underserved areas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1030 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
